alert.note: Alert for Camden (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 08 at 5:31PM CDT until May 08 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CAMDEN COUNTY... At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Laurie, or 13 miles northwest of Camdenton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks, Ha Ha Tonka State Park, Lake of The Ozarks State Park, Osage Beach, Camdenton, Village of Four Seasons, Laurie, Sunrise Beach, Linn Creek, Green Bay Terrace, Hurricane Deck, Old Linn Creek, Barnumton and Purvis. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
